Argumentative essays are type of like superpowers: they allow you to get what you want using the superpower of influence. Watch this video and learn how to channel persuasion to write down a good essay. An argumentative essay is a writing part meant to persuade someone to imagine the way you do. Though it's usually prearranged as an essay, there are some specific elements that are needed in an argumentative essay. The first and the main important element in a persuasive essay is the position, or what side the author is on. For an argument essay to be effective, it must hold positive elements that will influence the audience to see things from your viewpoint.
